directions: Heat olive oil, garlic, red pepper flakes, and paprika in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Once the oil is hot and the garlic has turned golden brown, increase heat to high and add the shrimp. Cook until the shrimp turn pink and opaque, about 3 minutes.
Deglaze the pan with sherry or lemon juice and  season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve garnished with chopped parsley.
ingredients: 1 pound medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
2 tablespoons dry sherry or lemon juice
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
2 tablespoons chopped Italian flat leaf parsley
title: Sizzling Sherry Shrimp with Garlic
